title: SmartCart
description: E-Commerce website for selling ITC (International Test Center) products, with features such as Product List, Add to Cart, Checkout, Payment Gateway, etc. Supports multiple languages and login/register with Google

title: Chat Feature
description: A chat feature has been implemented for tournament participants, facilitating direct communication on the platform and obviating the need to utilize an external application.

title: Metaco Esport Network
description: Metaco Esport Network is a website for event organizers to host tournaments and access new users. Our platform streamlines the process for organizers and participants.

title: PVP Tic Tac Toe

title: ASD Bakrie
description: A cutting-edge e-commerce app for palm oil commodities has been developed, providing farmers with access to high-quality seeds and seamless transactions through Midtrans payment gateway integration. Available in two languages, itâ€™s accessible to a wider audience.

title: Lokakain
description: An e-commerce app for fabrics has been developed, offering a wide variety of fabrics and allowing offline stores to join as partners. The website is integrated with the secure Midtrans payment gateway for easy transactions.

title: Badiklat PMI
description: A dynamic certification website for society, especially PMI employees, has been created with engaging and challenging question types.
